remarks: Version of ~ dvelim without any variable restrictions.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Oct-2002.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 11-May-2018.)
statement:
dvelimh.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
dvelimh.2 $e |- ( ps -> A. z ps ) $.
dvelimh.3 $e |- ( z = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
dvelimh $p |- ( -. A. x x = y -> ( ps -> A. x ps ) ) $.
